android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to read all of the calendar events stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your calendar events to other people.

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.info: add or modify calendar events and send emails to guests
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to add or change the events on your calendar, which may send emails to guests. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your calendar events or to send emails to guests.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

certificate_analysis.description: The app is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.The manifest indicates SHA256withRSA is in use. Please verify this manually.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.bandsintown.widget.UpdateWidgetService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: Bandsintown Concerts
playstore_details.description:
The highest rated and #1 downloaded concert discovery app for Android!
Never miss another live show.

Consider Bandsintown your go-to concert buddy. Our free app simplifies concert discovery by allowing you to track your favorite artists, be the first to receive tour alerts, and buy tickets - all in one place. Sync Bandsintown with your music apps to automatically connect with your favorite musicians, discover new music and get concert recommendations based on the music you’re already obsessed with. Join over 55 million fans who use Bandsintown to ensure they never miss the live music they love.

• Get tickets to the hottest shows in your area
• Sync your music libraries through apps like Spotify, Apple Music & Facebook to automatically track your favorites from over 530,000 artists
• Receive concert notifications when bands you love are on tour or playing a festival, plus access exclusive interviews, news & more
• Browse upcoming events for any artist or city
• Discover new music and shows near you based on the music you love
• Add shows to your calendar and invite your friends to the next event
• Share photos of your epic concert experience with other music-obsessed fans

Named one of TIME Magazine’s 50 Best Apps of the Year and Business Insider’s The App 100: The World’s Greatest Apps

Terms of Use: http://corp.bandsintown.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://corp.bandsintown.com/privacy

◦ Bugs? Feedback? ◦
Email: suppport@bandsintown.com
playstore_details.summary: Find local concerts and buy tickets on the #1 rated and downloaded concert app
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Find local concerts and buy tickets on the #1 rated and downloaded concert app
playstore_details.developerAddress: 215 Lexington Avenue, 18th floor New York, NY 10016
playstore_details.recentChanges: - You can now search for festivals!
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML: - You can now search for festivals!
